1.title: Kathmandu
1.plot: Discovering the best of Kathmandu under 14 hours by visiting some of the most important landmarks and free attractions, as well as sampling many of local cheap eats.

2.title: Prague
2.plot: Discover the best of Prague under 16 hours layover, including a visit to some of the most important landmarks and free attractions, getting around and eating cheap.

3.title: Toronto
3.plot: Two teenagers Mahta and Katelynne is making the most out of a 16 hour layover in Toronto, by visiting some of the famous and iconic landmarks and free attractions. Also featuring cheap eats and getting around using public transportation.

1.title: Paris
1.plot: The host is laying over in Paris for eight hours and making the most out of it by visiting some of its most famous landmarks for under $50.

2.title: Singapore
2.plot: The host will discover the best of Singapore for free, all under 24 hours, including best way to get around, cheap food, free attractions and famous landmarks.

3.title: Addis Ababa
3.plot: The host Charles Huang is making the best of our 12 hours layover in Addis Ababa by hiring a full day driver to all the free attractions, important landmarks and sampling its famous coffee.

4.title: Manila
4.plot: Featuring the best of Manila in in 18 hours by discovering all the free attractions and important landmarks, the host also shows how to get around and many famous local cheap eats.

5.title: Los Angeles
5.plot: Discover the best of Los Angeles under 16 hours, including some of the most iconic and famous landmarks, free parking and cheap eats.

imdb.plot outline: One of the world most famous backpackers Charles Huang proves that layover does not need to dreadful. Rather he shows you can do a lot with little time and little money, from how to get of the airport quickly and inexpensively, and list of free places and amazing foods you can discover in some of the most popular cities around the world. All done safely, inexpensively and easily.
imdb.title: DIY Layover
plot: Do a lot with little time and little money, from how to get of the airport quickly and inexpensively, and list of free places and amazing foods you can discover in some of the most popular layover hubs around the world.::DIY Travel Show
